title: Seduced by the American Millionaire
description: An Erotic Novella of Desire and TemptationLife in the suburbs has been domestic, not daring. A fateful trip into the city delivers unsuspecting single mom Jenny Babin into the hands of ruthless Richard Bergeron.Richard lives in a dark underworld where money is made and lost with a roll of the dice.Jenny is drawn into an erotic relationship filled with passion, dominance and dark persuasion.Can she escape Richard's control before it's too late? Or will her time in the city become the life she's always dreamed of?Erotic Romance/novella5,000 words/80 pp
author: Lynda Chance
